Fire Hazards In Bangladesh

This is a personal project. Here I tried to visualize the data available on the official website of Bangladesh Fire Service so that it is more organized and easy to understand.
The data provided by the Fire Service website was very messy, unorganized. I have transformed the data to a more usable format. This cleaned data can be found in the here.
I used R to do the visualizations. The R codes can be found here.
You can see the full report on this data here
